attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We do not believe that humans should take pleasure or entertainment from unnecessary animal suffering. Tradition is not a valid reason for continuing any activity.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "keep the Hunting Act 2004."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13975.asp

Prime Minister's Office
